data.text:
Candy man, he′s been and gone My candy man, he's been and gone My candy man, he′s been and gone And I love everything in this God almighty world God knows I do Peppermint stick Got a little brass band I got a peppermint stick I got a little brass band I got a peppermint stick I got a little brass band And I'm a-goin' down to the gate To score the candy man stand Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer ′Cause I love everything in this God almighty world God knows I do Candy man, he′s been and gone My candy man, and his name's John My candy man, he′s Morocco bound And I'd give everything in this God almighty world To bring my candy man home Black-skin man, give me bad deal Oh, black-skin man, give me bad deal Oh, black-skin man, give me bad deal And I′d give everything in this God almighty world To bring my candy man home Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer Run, fetch a pitcher, get the (candy man) baby some beer 'Cause I love everything in this God almighty world God knows I do Candy man, I love the man Yeah, my candy man, he gets me high My candy man, yeah, I love the man And I′d give everything in this God almighty world To bring my candy man home Writer(s): Donovan Leitch
